episodes.title: The Venture Bros. and the Curse of the Haunted Problem
episodes.plot: The past is haunting the Venture building, literally. Can a good exorcism fix everything? Meanwhile, Hank is pressured by goons to break off his relationship with their mobster boss' daughter.

episodes.title: The Rorqual Affair
episodes.plot: Deadly waters surround the Monarch when he becomes Wide Wale's prisoner in Part 2 of the Morphic Trilogy.

episodes.title: Arrears in Science
episodes.plot: The Morphic Trilogy reaches its stunning conclusion in a decades-spanning tale of friendship, betrayal, and mass murder that overwrites Venture history.

episodes.title: The High Cost of Loathing
episodes.plot: The Monarch faces financial challenges as he attempts to rebuild his fiendish organization, while Dean attempts to build a normal life out of his father's shadow at college.

episodes.title: The Inamorata Consequence
episodes.plot: Dr. Venture moderates the second annual Treaty of Tolerance Summit (at the old Venture compound) where the Guild of Calamitous Intent and the O.S.I. argue over new agreements. Meanwhile, both Dean and Hank go on side adventures around the compound.

episodes.title: The Bellicose Proxy
episodes.plot: Monarch and 21 train their first arch as part of their induction into the Guild; Dr. Mrs. the Monarch deals with the mole.

episodes.title: The Unicorn in Captivity
episodes.plot: Dr. Venture's latest invention is a real game-changer. And the new game is deadly!

episodes.title: The Terminus Mandate
episodes.plot: Mrs. Monarch finds out from the Guild Council charter that they must either retire as villains, and commit one last arch each, or leave the Guild Council. Dr. Venture tries to get laid by a black widower.

episodes.title: The Forecast Manufacturer
episodes.plot: On behalf the Guild, Mr. and Mrs. Monarch and 21 go to take out the PP leader. Dr. Venture and Billy go investigate a stolen Guild weather machine. Hank goes out to rescue his girlfriend.

episodes.title: The Saphrax Protocol
episodes.plot: Deep inside Guild Headquarters, The Monarch and 21 face their ultimate ordeal. Meanwhile, the Venture Brothers face one of their own.
